terms.definition: A systematic process of ensuring that products or services meet specified requirements and standards through testing, inspection, and validation procedures.
Software as a Service - a cloud-based software delivery model where applications are hosted by a provider and accessed via the internet.
A system that tracks and manages changes to documents or code over time, allowing users to see revision history and ensure everyone works with the current version.
A single, unified location where all organizational documents, files, and resources are stored and managed for easy access and maintenance.
The use of software to automatically execute business processes and tasks according to predefined rules, reducing manual intervention and improving efficiency.
The systematic monitoring and documentation of adherence to regulatory requirements, industry standards, and internal policies.
Documents that are properly organized, searchable, and formatted to meet regulatory inspection requirements and can be quickly retrieved during audits.
The ability to track and document the history, application, or location of items through recorded identification numbers and maintain a clear audit trail.
The process of confirming that a product design meets specified requirements (verification) and fulfills its intended purpose (validation).
A systematic approach to identifying the underlying reasons for problems or defects to prevent their recurrence.
The adherence to laws, regulations, guidelines, and specifications relevant to an organization's business processes and industry requirements.
The automated process of sending documents to specific individuals or departments for review, approval, or action according to predefined workflows.
The process of creating searchable references and tags for documents to enable quick retrieval and organization of information.
A documentation approach where multiple team members can simultaneously contribute, edit, and review documents in a shared environment.
A centralized repository of information, documentation, and resources that provides answers to common questions and solutions to problems.
